questions.question: What does the idiom 'a bitter pill to swallow' mean?
options: An unpleasant fact that must be accepted

questions.question: If someone says they need 'a dose of their own medicine,' what do they mean?
options: Someone should experience the same bad treatment they give others

questions.question: What does the idiom 'to have a clean bill of health' mean?

To be declared healthy after examination
